statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_trends;
SELECT id, color, style FROM fashion_trends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT color, style, material FROM fashion_trends WHERE style = 'Casual';
SELECT * FROM fashion_trends WHERE material = 'Cotton';
SELECT id, color, material FROM fashion_trends ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT id, color FROM fashion_trends WHERE style='Casual' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_trends WHERE material='Cotton' ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT id, style, color FROM fashion_trends WHERE material='Leather' ORDER BY style, color;
SELECT * FROM fashion_trends WHERE id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY color DESC, id;
SELECT id, style, material FROM fashion_trends WHERE color='Blue' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM colors;
SELECT color_name FROM colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT style_name, description FROM styles WHERE color_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM styles WHERE style_name ILIKE 'mod%';
SELECT color_name FROM colors WHERE color_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM colors;
SELECT color_id, color_name FROM colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT style_id, style_name, description FROM styles WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM styles WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY style_name ASC;
SELECT color_name, COUNT(*) AS total_styles FROM colors JOIN styles ON colors.color_id = styles.color_id GROUP BY color_name ORDER BY total_styles DESC;
SELECT * FROM colors;
SELECT color_name FROM colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT color_id, color_name FROM colors WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT style_name FROM styles;
SELECT material_name FROM materials WHERE material_id > 3;
SELECT color_name FROM colors WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_id FROM materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT style_id, style_name FROM styles WHERE style_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT color_name, material_name, style_name FROM colors, materials, styles WHERE colors.color_id = 2 AND materials.material_id = 1 AND styles.style_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM colors WHERE color_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM colors;
SELECT color_name FROM colors WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM styles ORDER BY style_name DESC;
SELECT material_name FROM materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT style_name, color_name, material_name FROM styles JOIN colors ON styles.style_id = colors.color_id JOIN materials ON styles.style_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM colors ORDER BY color_id DESC;
SELECT color_name, material_name FROM colors c JOIN materials m ON c.color_id = m.material_id;
SELECT style_name, trend_description FROM styles s JOIN fashion_trends ft ON s.style_id = ft.style_id;
SELECT color_name, style_name, material_name FROM colors c, styles s, materials m JOIN fashion_trends ft ON c.color_id = ft.color_id AND s.style_id = ft.style_id AND m.material_id = ft.material_id;
SELECT * FROM fashion_trends WHERE color_id = 2 AND material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM colors;
SELECT color_name FROM colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;

SELECT item_name, color_name, style_name, material_name FROM fashion_items JOIN colors ON fashion_items.color_id = colors.color_id JOIN styles ON fashion_items.style_id = styles.style_id JOIN materials ON fashion_items.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT color_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM colors JOIN fashion_items ON colors.color_id = fashion_items.color_id GROUP BY color_name ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM colors WHERE color_name = 'Red';
SELECT item_name, style_name, material_name FROM fashion_items JOIN styles ON fashion_items.style_id = styles.style_id JOIN materials ON fashion_items.material_id = materials.material_id;

SELECT item_name, color_name, style_name, material_name FROM fashion_items JOIN colors ON fashion_items.color_id = colors.color_id JOIN styles ON fashion_items.style_id = styles.style_id JOIN materials ON fashion_items.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE color_id = 1 AND style_id = 2;
SELECT color_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM fashion_items JOIN colors ON fashion_items.color_id = colors.color_id GROUP BY color_name;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends;
